thread.title: Anthony Amodeo
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Anthony Amodeo

author: Anthony Amodeo
title: Anthony Amodeo
text: I will not shop for furniture anywhere else. Usually I feel very pressured when walking into a furniture store, but not this time. Our salesperson, Rebecca, never pushed the more expensive beds on us, yet did ask us several questions and guided us to a bed that was not only comfortable, but also had a very comfortable price tag.
